ValidationMessage.name: CasClbRemainingOpenOrders
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: There are still open orders.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbNotAllMandatoryStoreSurveysAnswered
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please answer all mandatory store surveys. #questions#

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbNotAllMandatoryPOSSurveysAnswered
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please answer all mandatory POS Surveys. #questions#

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbNotAllMandatoryStoreQuestionsAnswered
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please answer all mandatory store questions. #questions#

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbNotAllMandatoryPOSQuestionsAnswered
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please answer all mandatory POS questions. #questions#

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbCallOutOfOpeningTime
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please choose a visit time that is within the visiting periods defined for this business partner's opening time.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbTimeFromGreaterTimeThru
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please enter a Time Thru greater than Time From.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbDateFromGreaterDateThru
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please enter a Visit Start Date earlier than Visit End Date.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbCallDateFromNotInSubstitutionTimeFrame
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please enter a new call date that is compliant with the substitution time frame.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbFillInAllValues
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please fill in all values.
ValidationMessage.comment: All fields need to be filled with values.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbNotEditable
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The selected call is not editable.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbCannotCreateSubstitutedCall
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: A call of a substituted user cannot be created outside of the substitution time frame.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbCallTemplateDoesNotAllowCustomer
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The selected call type cannot be used for a customer.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbCallTemplateDoesNotAllowNoCustomer
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please select a customer.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbAssetRequiredScanning
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The asset can be registered only via bar code scanner.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbNoOfPicturesExceedsMaxCount
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Max number of pictures reached for this call.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbAdjustPictureDimension
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: We’ve adjusted the image to the configured maximum values. Contact your system admin for details.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbSomethingWentWrong
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Something’s not right with the image. Contact your system admin for details.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbNoGeoLocation
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Location of the customer cannot be determined.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbCannotCreateCallWhileSubstituted
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: An active substitution is running for you and the selected customer. You are not allowed to create calls during the substitution time frame, if you are the substituted user.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbCannotCreateCallWithZeroCallDuration
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Call duration must be greater than 0.
ValidationMessage.comment: Cannot create calls with zero default duration.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbDateMustBeInBetweenMinAndMaxDatePolicy
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Looks like you’ve selected an invalid date. Select a date that’s between #minValue# and #maxValue#.
ValidationMessage.comment: Date must be in between min and max date policy.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbDateMustBeOnOrBeforeTodayDatePolicy
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Looks like you’ve selected an invalid date. Select a date that's on or before today's date.
ValidationMessage.comment: Date must be on or before today's date.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbDateMustBeOnOrAfterTodayDatePolicy
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Looks like you’ve selected an invalid date. Select a date that's on or after today's date.
ValidationMessage.comment: Date must be on or after today's date.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbDateMustBeTodayDatePolicy
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Looks like you’ve selected an invalid date. Select today's date.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbCallsMayNotSpanSeveralDays
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: A call must not span several days.
ValidationMessage.comment: All fields need to be filled with values.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbCallHasReferencedOrder
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Due to active orders present, this call cannot be deleted.
ValidationMessage.comment: A call cannot be deleted if it has referenced orders.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbCallCannotBeCreated
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Call cannot be created without selecting call template.
ValidationMessage.comment: A call cannot be created without selecting call template.

ValidationMessage.name: CasClbCallInvalidManagementRelation
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The management relation of the customer is not valid for the date of the call.
ValidationMessage.comment: The management relation of the customer needs to be valid.
